about_the_game: Enter a new hero, a dashing heroine, slicing everything with a crescent knife.
detailed_description: Enter a new hero, a dashing heroine, slicing everything with a crescent knife.
name: YanYueDaokill NewHero

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core(TM)I5-4300U CPU@1.90GHz 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA HD 4400
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-12700K 3.60GH
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 920M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
